steps: step 1: Login at https://testops.staging.katalon.com/login?redirect=%252F%253F --> navigate to Page_home
step 2: At Page_home click on hyperlink_project --> navigate to Page_project
step 3: At Page_project click on hyperlink_releases --> navigate to Page_releases
step 4: At Page_releases click on hyperlink_create_release --> navigate to Page_releases_create
step 5: At Page_releases_create click on button_select_organization
step 6: Add visual checkpoint at Page_releases_create
